inkumbulo yokufinyelela okungahleliwe: Inkumbulo eguquguqukayo lapho kugcinwa khona izinhlelo ezisebenzayo nedatha
i-hard disk drive: Idivayisi yokugcina enkulu engaguquki isebenzisa izicwecwe kazibuthe
idrayivu yesimo esiqinile: Isitoreji esingaguquguquki sisebenzisa imemori ye-flash, ngokushesha kunama-HDD
ibhasi: Indlela yokuthi idatha ihambe phakathi kwezingxenye
ibhodi lomama: Ibhodi lesifunda eliyinhloko elixhumanisa zonke izingxenye zekhompyutha
ikheli le-ip: Inkomba yenombolo ehlukile enikezwe idivayisi ngayinye kunethiwekhi
umkhawulokudonsa: Izinga eliphezulu lokudluliswa kwedatha kumzila wenethiwekhi
ukubambezeleka: Ukubambezeleka kwesikhathi kokuthi idatha ihambe isuka emthonjeni iye endaweni okuyiwa kuyo
